title: Xbox Partner Preview Livestream
description:
Get ready for a look into the future as Microsoft presents the Xbox Partner Preview Livestream October 25th at 10am PT. Learn all about new titles from third-party partners such as Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth, Alan Wake 2, Ark: Survival Ascended, and Dungeons of Hinterberg. With so many great games on the horizon, you don't want to miss a minute of this show.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox

title: Amazon's Fallout TV Show Finally Has a Release Date - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description: You may remember this teaser image Prime Video released last year to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the Fallout franchise, which was our first glimpse at the upcoming live-action series. The tweet read, ‘Congratulations and happy 25th birthday! We made something special for the occasion.’ Something special being a live-action adaptation of the #Fallout franchise coming to the Amazon streaming service. We see in the image a couple of Vault dwellers wearing the iconic Vault 33 jumpsuits. As we inch ever so closer to the show’s release window, we now know exactly when to expect it to hit Prime Video: April 12th, 2024. This was revealed via Pip-Boy in another Twitter post from the Fallout Prime Video account. This is the first public video pertaining to the series, which is more of just a teaser of the release date than anything else. An update on Paddington 3, Paddington in Peru, and finally, from one country to another, The Rock’s got some beef with a museum in Paris.

title: HOW ARE YOU LIKING SPIDER-MAN 2 SO FAR? #spiderman2ps5 #spiderman #peterparker #yurilowenthal
Freelance - Official Clip (2023) John Cena, Alison Brie
description:
Ex-Special Forces operative Mason Pettits (John Cena) is stuck in a dead-end desk job when he’s reluctantly recruited by former military buddy Sebastian Earle (Christian Slater) to take on a simple freelance gig providing security for washed-up journalist Claire Wellington (Alison Brie).  
He begrudgingly escorts Claire on assignment to interview a ruthless – but impeccably dressed – dictator Juan Venegas (Juan Pablo Raba), when a military coup breaks out just as she’s about to get the scoop of a lifetime. Now, the unlikely trio must figure out how to survive the jungle AND each other in order to make it out alive!

From Pierre Morel the dynamic director of Taken and Peppermint, and written by Jacob Lentz,  Freelance also stars Alice Eve, Martin Csokas, Julianna Arrieta and Sebastian Eslava. 
Freelance is in theaters only October 27.

#IGN #Movies

title: Apex Legends: Ignite - Official Launch Trailer
description:
Get another look at Apex Legend's newest Legend, Conduit, in this latest trailer for the free-to-play battle royale game. Apex Legends: Ignite will be available on October 31, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #ApexLegends

title: Who Are Your Favorite Twitch Streamers? - TwitchCon 2023
description:
Miss TwitchCon 2023? Join IGN's Alan Wheeler as he patrols the show floor for you! We're hitting up fans on the show floor to find out some of their favorite streamers of all time, like Pokimane, Hasan Piker, and more! And who knows! You might discover a new favorite with these recommendations.
Twitch Con 2023 in Las Vegas features a ton of news, merch, and the opportunity to meet your favorite streams. All weekend long, the convention floor is home to the Twitch Con Opening Ceremony, musical performances, and so much more!
Presented by the NBA

title: How Call of Duty Reinvented The First-Person Shooter
description:
For the 20th anniversary of Call of Duty, IGN takes a retrospective look at how the WW2 shooter reinvented the FPS, with help from one of the original developers, Mackey McCandlish, who worked at Infinity Ward from 2002 to 2010, as a designer.

From the original Call of Duty, to console ports, and Modern Warfare, here's how Call of Duty 1 reinvented the first-person shooter, while honouring games before it, like Medal of Honor.

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty

title: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Code Red - Official Trailer (2023)
description:
Check out the trailer for LEGO Marvel Avengers: Code Red, a new original special, streaming on Disney+ on October 27, 2023.

#IGN #Marvel #LEGO

title: New Anime to Watch Fall 2023
description: A robot detective, regenerating undead, and some new banging Eurobeat tracks to drive to are what you can expect this fall anime season. There's a new season full of anime to check out this Fall like hilariously fun Undead Unluck, the visually stunning Pluto, and the upcoming finale of Attack on Titan Final Season THE FINAL CHAPTERS Special 2. Across Crunchyroll, HIDIVE, Hulu, and Netflix, as well as others, there are a lot of places to enjoy anime at the moment. Don't forget to stick to the end of the video to see the list of Fall anime 2023 available this season. Let us know which 2023 Fall anime you're looking forward to in the comments below!

title: Netflix's Life on Our Planet: Exclusive Clip (2023) Morgan Freeman
description:
In this intense exclusive clip from Netflix's Life on Our Planet, narrated by Morgan Freeman, a momma T-Rex and her babies hunt down a triceratops.

This is the story of life’s epic battle to conquer and survive on planet Earth. Today there are 20 million species on our planet, yet what we see is just a snapshot in time — 99% of earth’s inhabitants are lost to our deep past. The story of what happened to these dynasties — their rise and their fall – is truly remarkable.

In partnership with Industrial Light & Magic, the series uses the latest technology and science to bring long-extinct creatures back to life, Life on Our Planet reveals the incredible story of life on our planet. Narrated by Morgan Freeman and from executive producer Steven Spielberg and the Emmy Award-winning team behind Our Planet.

The series will debut on Netflix on October 25.

#LifeOnOurPlanet #Clip #Netflix

title: Ghostrunner 2 Review
description:
Ghostrunner 2 is an electric sequel that supercharges everything that made the first game so spectacular, while also vastly increasing the scope and scale of its world. Ghostrunner 2 review by Mitchell Saltzman on PC. Also available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S.

#Ghostrunner2 #Review #IGN

title: Ripout - Official Early Access Launch Trailer
description:
Ripout is a first-person horror shooter in which humans are pursued through space by an ever-adapting and evolving enemy. Fortunately, you've got weapons like the "petgun" to give them a taste of their own medicine, as well as the option to bring along a friend in co-op play. Ripout launches into Steam Early Access on October 24.

#Ripout #EarlyAccess

title: Squadron 42 - Official Gameplay Overview
description:
Watch this detailed Squadron 42 gameplay deep dive with members of the team from developer Cloud Imperium Studio including founder and CEO, Chris Roberts. Join the team to learn more about the upcoming sci-fi game, featuring the voice talents of Gillian Anderson, Mark Hamill, Andy Serkis, Gary Oldman, and more. 

In the overview, the team announces that Squadron 42 is now feature complete and has entered its polish phase. Prepare to embark on a cinematic single-player adventure as a rookie Navy combat pilot in the Star Citizen universe. Overcome challenging missions, take on deadly enemies, and learn more about your crewmates aboard a living capital ship.
Squadron 42's release date has yet to be announced.

#IGN #Gaming #Squadron42

title: Cities: Skylines II is out tomorrow, don’t miss your chance to pre-order! #ad
Cities: Skylines II ⁠– 10 Unexpected Things You Can Do
description:
Think you know Cities: Skylines II? Think again. You may be able to build the city of your dreams, but what about the city of your nightmares? We threw the book on planning regulations out the window and let our imagination run wild, and the results were quite something. Here are 10 unexpected things you can do in Cities: Skylines II. Sponsored by Paradox Interactive.

#IGN #Gaming #CitiesSkylines

title: Survival Expert Reacts to Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater
description:
Watch a survival expert react to MGS 3 Snake Eater. With the Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection soon to be released, we asked the UK military's chief survival instructor, John Hudson, to react to Snake Eater's many survival mechanics! Wilderness and survival expert John Hudson offers his critiques, and insights into MGS3 and its gameplay, such as foraging for food, surviving in the forest, using camo, and more!

00:00 - Intro
00:20 - Quicksand
01:32 - Hornet’s Nest
02:32 - On-Site Injuries
03:41 - Camouflage
04:36 - Leeches
05:28 - Food Deprivation
06:12 - Human Night Vision
06:57 - Crocodile Cap
07:32 - Poisonous Tree Frog
08:05 - Foraging & Hunting
09:10 - Final Thoughts

Thank you to John for joining us and sharing his superb survival insight. You can find out more about John here - https://www.johnhudsonsurvival.com/

#IGN #Gaming #MetalGearSolid

title: EA Sports FC 24 - On the Pitch vs In the Game
description:
Recently some lucky Uber One members won an incredible experience, the chance to hang out with Aussie football star Cortnee Vine and The Masterbucks, and see if their skills in EA SPORTS FC 24 translate to the pitch. You be the judge, and watch the IGN AU community in action.
Presented by Uber One.
